# Pest Experts â€” Professional Pest Control in Gauteng, South Africa

> Pest Experts is a licensed and fully insured pest control company serving Gauteng Province, South Africa. We provide safe, effective pest treatments for residential, commercial, and industrial properties across Pretoria, Johannesburg, Centurion, Sandton, Midrand, and surrounding areas. Our services include inspection, treatment, and prevention with guaranteed results.

## Company Information

- Canonical URL: https://pestexperts.co.za
- Location: Gauteng Province, South Africa
- Phone: Available on [Contact Page](https://pestexperts.co.za/contact/)
- Service region: Pretoria, Johannesburg, Centurion, Sandton, Midrand, Randburg, Roodepoort, and surrounding suburbs

## Services

- [Residential Pest Control Services](https://pestexperts.co.za/services/residential-pest-control-services/): Home pest protection for ants, cockroaches, rodents, termites, and more. Safe for families and pets.
- [Commercial Pest Control Solutions](https://pestexperts.co.za/services/commercial-pest-control-solutions/): Tailored pest management for businesses ensuring compliance, hygiene, and brand protection.
- [Industrial Pest Management](https://pestexperts.co.za/services/industrial-pest-management-gauteng/): Large-scale pest control for industrial facilities, warehouses, and operations.
- [Termite Control & Soil Poisoning](https://pestexperts.co.za/services/termite-control-soil-poisoning/): Specialised termite treatments including pre- and post-construction soil poisoning with 5-year structural guarantee.
- [Cockroach Extermination](https://pestexperts.co.za/services/cockroach-extermination/): Targeted cockroach treatments for homes and businesses using gel baiting and residual spray methods.
- [Rodent Control & Bait Station Management](https://pestexperts.co.za/services/rodent-control-bait-station-management/): Professional rodent management using tamper-resistant bait stations and exclusion techniques.
- [Bed Bug Treatments](https://pestexperts.co.za/services/bed-bug-treatments/): Heat and chemical treatment solutions for bed bug infestations in homes and hospitality.
- [Ant Control Solutions](https://pestexperts.co.za/services/ant-control-solutions/): Targeted ant colony elimination using bait systems and barrier treatments.
- [Restaurant & Food Premises Pest Control](https://pestexperts.co.za/services/restaurant-food-premises-pest-control/): Food-safe pest control designed for restaurants, kitchens, and food processing environments.
- [Office & Retail Pest Control](https://pestexperts.co.za/services/office-retail-pest-control/): Discreet pest control for professional environments.
- [Warehouse & Logistics Pest Control](https://pestexperts.co.za/services/warehouse-logistics-pest-control/): Targeted solutions to prevent contamination and protect stock.
- [School & Healthcare Pest Control](https://pestexperts.co.za/services/school-healthcare-pest-control/): Safe, regulated treatments for sensitive environments.
- [Body Corporate & Estate Pest Control](https://pestexperts.co.za/services/body-corporate-estate-pest-control/): Scheduled treatments and reporting for complexes and shared spaces.
- [Seasonal Pest Control](https://pestexperts.co.za/services/seasonal-pest-control/): Proactive treatments targeting pests during peak seasonal activity.

## Service Areas

- [Pretoria](https://pestexperts.co.za/service-areas/pretoria/): Including Brooklyn, Menlyn, Waterkloof, Garsfontein, Montana, and Pretoria North.
- [Centurion](https://pestexperts.co.za/service-areas/centurion/): Including Irene, Eldoraigne, Highveld, and Raslouw.
- [Sandton](https://pestexperts.co.za/service-areas/sandton/): Including Bryanston, Morningside, Rivonia, Hyde Park, and Fourways.
- [Midrand](https://pestexperts.co.za/service-areas/midrand/): Including Halfway House, Noordwyk, Kyalami, Waterfall, and Carlswald.
- [Johannesburg South](https://pestexperts.co.za/service-areas/johannesburg-south/): Including Glenvista, Mondeor, Bassonia, and Oakdene.
- [Randburg](https://pestexperts.co.za/service-areas/randburg/): Including Rosebank, Parkhurst, Linden, Greenside, and Northcliff.
- [Roodepoort](https://pestexperts.co.za/service-areas/roodepoort/): Including Florida, Honeydew, Ruimsig, and Constantia Kloof.
- [Silverton](https://pestexperts.co.za/service-areas/silverton/)
- [Lynnwood](https://pestexperts.co.za/service-areas/lynnwood/)
- [Lynnwood Glen](https://pestexperts.co.za/service-areas/lynnwood-glen/)
- [Menlo Park](https://pestexperts.co.za/service-areas/menlo-park/)
- [Moreleta Park](https://pestexperts.co.za/service-areas/moreleta-park/)

## Why Choose Pest Experts

- Licensed and fully insured pest control professionals
- Local technicians with area-specific pest knowledge
- Transparent pricing with no hidden costs
- Guaranteed results with retreatment warranties
- Fast response times and flexible scheduling
- Safe treatments for families, pets, and the environment
- Trusted by local residential and commercial customers
